subject: Basketball
Cards and Card Games
lead_paragraph: The favored in-flight pastime of a group of players including Al Horford, Kent Bazemore and Dennis Schroder is a schoolchildren’s card game with some added twists.
snippet: The favored in-flight pastime of a group of players including Al Horford, Kent Bazemore and Dennis Schroder is a schoolchildren’s card game with some added twists.
